page.shortlink: api a5 convert date string function
page.description: The A5_CONVERT_DATE_STRING() function reformats a date string, by converting a date string from one format to another. E.g. from DMY format to YMD format.
page.prototype: Output_Date as C = a5_convert_date_string(C dateString ,C InDateFormat ,C OutDateFormat [,C separator ])

argument.name: dateString
argument.description: The original data string, containing values for year, month, and day. Character

argument.name: InDateFormat
argument.description: A character string containing the letters "Y", "M", and "D" that indicates the sequence of input values.

argument.name: OutDateFormat
argument.description: A character string containing the letters "Y", "M", and "D" that indicates the sequence of output values.

argument.name: separator
argument.description: The character(s) to place between the year, month, and day values.
